programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Duas mulheres, uma negra e uma branca, em 1955 Montgomery Alabama, devem decidir o que faro em resposta ao famoso boicote aos nibus liderado por Martin Luther King.

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as guas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Famlia de Policiais II: Uma Quebra de Confiana, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Love And Bullets, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson um policial escolhido pelo governo dos Estados Unidos para cuidar de uma misso mortal na qual deve viajar meio mundo para capturar uma bela amante de um Czar submundo do crime.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difcil reencontro com questes do passado.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: Un Sac De Billes, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dois irmos judeus fogem por toda a Frana durante a ocupao alem na Segunda Guerra Mundial, tentando encontrar sua famlia novamente.

programme.title: E Se... Voc Tivesse Uma Segunda Chance?, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: H 15 anos, Ben Walker deixou sua namorada, sua cidade e seu ministrio por uma oportunidade de negcios. Agora ele tem uma slida carreira e uma noiva. Um dia ele visitado por um anjo que mostra como seria sua vida se ele tivesse seguido seu chamado.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)

programme.title: O Jri, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um membro do jri une foras com um "consultor" que tenta manipular o resultado do julgamento.

programme.title: Pitbull: Fora Bruta, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Europa Oriental, um jovem convive com a pobreza e a violncia das ruas, at que se junta ao submundo do crime, tornandose pea importante no esquema da mfia. Um policial segue no encalo dele e no vai parar at derrubar toda a rede.

programme.title: Evidncias de um Crime, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Aps a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profisso para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaando a vida estvel que construiu para a famlia.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Caada Sangrenta, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Steven Down o nico sobrevivente do exrcito dos EUA na Nicargua por volta de 1986 e foi torturado por um grupo paramilitar mascarado. Ele um homem paranico, problemtico e confuso. Um veterano em busca da verdade.

programme.title: Redeno, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Bravura Indmita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dlares um xerife caolho e beberro, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Rastros de dio, (1956, Western)

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoo. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e no terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: O Irresistvel Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notvel autoconfiana, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: O parceiro do diabo, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: Clay Lomax um assaltante de banco que foi trado e ferido por seu parceiro, e por isso foi condenado a oito anos de priso.

programme.title: Raa Brava, (1980, Western)
programme.desc: No Velho Oeste Bill Tyler, um comerciante de peles, tenta achar com seu melhor amigo, Henry Frapp, o lendrio vale conhecido pela enorme quantidade de animais para caar.

programme.title: Um Homem Dificil de Matar, (2003, Western)
programme.desc: Na fase final do Velho Oeste, um grupo de cowboys liderado por Monte enfrenta o envelhecimento e a falta de oportunidade oriunda do desuso de sua profisso.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A famlia Zachary uma famlia rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua me, alm dos outros trs filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que adotada.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em guas abertas, mas o diretor da priso local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Prisioneiro Espacial, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando Issac acorda dentro de uma sala estranha, ele descobre que na verdade um prisioneiro, que foi enviado ao espao para iniciar a primeira colnia da Terra fora do mundo como uma nova punio.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporo ameaa destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extino.

programme.title: Aliana Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canad-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Foras Especiais, a ajud-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kug Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Honor, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Dois amigos do mesmo bairro que seguiram caminhos diferentes devem decidir se ficaro do lado da lei ou das gangues quando novos confrontos comearem.

programme.title: Island In The Sky, (1953, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set after World War II, John Wayne plays Dooley, a former army pilot flying transport missions, who is forced to crash-land his fuel-starved plane on a frozen lake after it strays from its course.

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Premingers epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: The Quiet Man, (1952, Comedy)
programme.desc: An American ex-boxer returns to Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this film has beautiful scenery and local charm.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Stella Dallas, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: A working-class woman is willing to do whatever it takes to give her daughter a socially promising future.

programme.title: City Lights, (1931, Comedy)
programme.desc: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

programme.title: The Great Dictator, (1940, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: London Has Fallen, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: 40th Anniversary, (1974, Horror)
programme.desc: Five youths on a weekend getaway fall prey to a depraved family of cannibals in Tobe Hooper's masterpiece of subversive horror, now featuring a 4k digital transfer and all-new surround sound mix supervised by the director.

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: For a decade, Texas Ranger Lefty Enright (Dennis Hopper) has sought to avenge the brutal murder of his kin by the cannibalistic Sawyer family Leatherface, Chop-Top, The Cook and Grandpa.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: 40th Anniversary, (1974, Horror)
programme.desc: Five youths on a weekend getaway fall prey to a depraved family of cannibals in Tobe Hooper's masterpiece of subversive horror, now featuring a 4k digital transfer and all-new surround sound mix supervised by the director.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: This is a point-of-view, found-footage horror film from the America's top genre filmmakers. A group of misfits are hired to burglarize a house and acquire a rare tape. They are confronted with a dead body, old televisions and a supply of cryptic footage.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 1
programme.desc: Rohan is convinced that Josuke is cheating in their game of Cee-lo when all the dice rolls in his opponents favor. Feeling insulted, Rohan stabs his own finger and swear hell find out how Josuke is cheating in their next round.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 2
programme.desc: Rohan sacrifices himself to save Josuke from a remote-controlled Stand that sucks nutrients out of its victims. Moved by Rohans act of bravery, Josuke races through town to find and defeat the Stands user before it can kill Rohan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Cats Love Yoshikage Kira
programme.desc: Shinobu tells her husband, Kosaku, that she saw a stray cat in their basement with a hole in its throat. When Kosaku goes down to take a look, he finds the cat already dead, The next morning, a strange plant sprouts from the spot where the cat was buried.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 1
programme.desc: Yoshihiro Kira spots Kosaku Kawajiri and instantly recognizes that its actually his son, Yoshikage. Meanwhile, Josuke, Okuyasu, and Mikitaka find a strange man living in an abandoned electrical tower.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the electrical tower again to save Mikitaka and defeat Toyohiro Kanedaichi. Meanwhile, Rohan receives a visit from a first-class architect named Masazo Kinoto, whos come to estimate the repair costs to his burnt house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinotos Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichis disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohans back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 1
programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Morel has been chased into an underground church by the lion-type Chimera Ant, Leol.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua have gained new allies and prepare to charge into battle.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With only one more day remaining until the selection, Gon, Killua and Ikalgo go over their strategy.
programme.sub-title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Welfin, a wolf-like Chimera Ant, has realized that someone has infiltrated the palace. With his sharp sense of smell, he tracks down the intruders.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company.

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kiras identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
programme.desc: Hayatos attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cats air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohans death.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and Hayato hide inside a nearby residence to escape from Deadly Queen and Stray Cats attack. But to their horror, Kira is somehow able to close in on them from outside the house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Goodbye, Morioh The Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends have finally cornered Yoshikage Kira. Refusing to give up, Kira tries to activate Bites the Dust one more time to escape his desperate situation. Can Josuke and the others stop Kira in time to save the future of Morioh?
programme.sub-title: Goodbye, Morioh The Heart of Gold

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Golden Wind
programme.desc: Amid the gritty beauty of Neapolis, the Joestar lineage lives on in Giorno Giovanna. After sidestepping long-term Joestar ally Koichi Hirose, Giorno must contend with two powerful Mafia gangsters, Leaky Eye Lucca and the enigmatic Bruno Bucciarati.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Eager to identify Leaky Eye Lucas attacker, Bucciarati confronts Giorno and unleashes a Stand attack to dismantle him piece by piece. But Giorno counters with his Stand Golden Wind, surprising not just his adversary, but also himself.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall
programme.desc: Determined to join the mafia gang Passione, altruistic Giorno is introduced by Bucciarati to the grotesquely corpulent Polpo, an incarcerated capo who tests Giornos loyalty with a simple but bizarrely lethal test involving a lighter and its flame.
programme.sub-title: Meet the Gangster Behind the Wall

programme.title: First Sunday, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals discover they haven't got a prayer when they attempt to steal from the local church.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox and Kimberly Elise star as four African American women living in a Los Angeles housing project who--pushed to the edge--resort to violence to escape poverty.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard: Homecoming, (2010, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: In the countdown to a national step-off, rivalries at Truth University run red-hot. The Theta Nus are counting on new pledge Chance Harris (Collins Pennie) to lead the team to victory. But he's too caught up in his own problems to focus. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: School Daze, (1988, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Innovative filmmaker, Spike Lee (She's Gotta Have It), brings to the screen a music-filled, offbeat contemporary comedy that takes an unforgettable look at black college life. Rating: R

programme.title: A Soldier's Story, (1984, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A fine drama set during World War II, in which a black military attorney investigates the death of a black sergeant. The lawyer eventually discovers that the sergeant was both ashamed of his own culture and virulently hated by his men.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: When Colonel James Braddock (Chuck Norris, "Missing in Action") is told that his wife and 12-year-old son are still alive in Communist Vietnam, he mounts a one-man assault to free themarmed with the latest high-tech firepower, of course!

programme.title: Code of Silence, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a stakeout marred by mob interference results in the death of an innocent bystander and a police cover-up, a Chicago detective is forced to adhere to his own personal code of ethics in an effort to rid the Windy City of its Warring crime factions.

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: An army of terrorist mercenaries led by Soviet agent Rostov catches America unprepared and makes it a war zone from sea to shining sea. Only one man can stem the rising tide of violence: retired agent and martial arts expert Matt Hunter.

programme.title: The Delta Force, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Political extremists have taken innocent people hostageand only super-soldiers Chuck Norris, Lee Marvin and The Delta Force can rescue them in this explosive adventure filled with wall-to-wall action! Martin Balsam and Shelley Winters also star.

programme.title: Delta Force 2: The Colombian Connection, (1990, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris is in peak form in this explosive action/adventure that brings back one of his most unforgettable characters, Delta Force Colonel Scott McCoy, for a daring mission to destroy a deadly drug cartel led by the ruthless Billy Drago!

programme.title: Enter the Ninja, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: The absorbing martial arts film that exposes Ninjutsu, the lethal, little-known "Art of Invisibility"... which includes the use of hypnotism, explosives, and super-human fighting skills.

programme.title: Revenge of the Ninja, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: Sho Kosugi ("Enter the Ninja") delivers a heart-pounding display of strength, speed and lethal Ninja know-how in this action-packed thriller that takes us back to the good old days of the Kung Fu extravaganza.

programme.title: American Ninja, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong, a one-man fighting machine. Serving in the army to avoid prison, Joe finds himself battling the deadly Black Star Order, as well as corrupt military leaders in order to bring down an illegal arms sale.

programme.title: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong saves an old friend from the clutches of "The Lion," an evil super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

programme.title: Airplane!, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: Voted one of the 10 funniest movies ever made by the American Film Institute, Airplane! is a masterpiece of off-the-wall comedy.

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: Theres a mad bomber on board, the first lunar shuttle is about to self-destruct, the engines are not working, and-worst of all-the flight crew discovers they are completely out of coffee!

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Enter the world of 1970s TV news, where Ron Burgundy and his loyal Channel 4 News Team are San Diego's #1 rated news source. All is well in their male-dominated world of news until rising star reporter Veronica Corningstone turns it upside down.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: The wait is over, America -- Ron Burgundy is back! After losing his job, Ron reassembles the news team and squares off against a new rival in the comedy that critics are calling one of the funniest movies of the year!

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: Zoolander, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three-time male model of the year, Derek Zoolander, is devastated when he loses the title to newbie Hansel. After the news, Mugatu's fashion empire brainwashes Derek into being an assassin.

programme.title: Zoolander 2, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: When the world's most beautiful people are in danger, former models Derek and Hansel are recruited for a top secret mission to defeat the criminal mastermind Mugatu. Prepare for a dangerously sexy adventure where looks really can kill.

programme.title: From Prada to Nada, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Nora and Mary are spoiled sisters living the good life in Beverly Hills until their loving father unexpectedly dies.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Mrs. Winterbourne, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: This fast-paced comedy follows the story of eighteen-year-old Connie Doyle an expectant mother with no money and an uncertain future.

programme.title: The Beautician and The Beast, (1997, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A New York cosmetologist mistakenly thought to be a science teacher is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

programme.title: Milk Money, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Frank Wheeler is determined to solve life's biggest mystery, women! So he pools his piggy-bank money and heads for the big city. The plan: to peek at a naked lady.

programme.title: Frankie & Johnny, (1991, Romance)
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer plays Frankie, a waitress at a N.Y.C. coffee shop. After a series of hurtful relationships, the last thing Frankies looking for is a new man...until he comes looking for her.

programme.title: Strictly Ballroom, (1992, Romance)
programme.desc: A championship ballroom dancer finds inspiration within, and decides he'll stop at nothing to win, even if it means rewriting the rules. A worldwide feel-good hit, with an incredible soundtrack, from director Baz Luhrmann (MOULIN ROUGE!).

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Assassin Club, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Henry Golding, Sam Neill, and Noomi Rapace star in this action-packed thriller. An elite assassin is given his final contract to kill six people around the world - only to discover the targets are equally skilled assassins hired to kill him.

programme.title: The Rhythm Section, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Blake Lively and Jude Law star in this action-packed thriller from the producers of James Bond. After finding out her family's death was not an accident, Stephanie (Lively) transforms from victim to assassin, seeking revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: Jagged Edge, (1985, Thriller)
programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: The Trust, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two corrupt police officers (Nicolas Cage and Elijah Wood) concoct a plan to rob a bank-style vault that belongs to a high-end heroin dealer.

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young Hannibal moves in with his aunt and begins plotting revenge after his baby sister is killed during World War II. Based on Thomas Harris' novel.

programme.title: Pacific Heights, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

programme.title: Side Effects, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: Bent, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this searing crime-thriller, a discredited cop hunting for his partner's killer accidentally uncovers a deadly government conspiracy tied to a woman's car-bomb murder.

programme.title: Downsizing, (2017, Dramedy)
programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, two brothers, against all the odds, come together to train for a historic title bout that has the power to reunite their fractured family and give their hard-luck town what it's been waiting for: pride.

programme.title: Cotton Club Encore, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's lavish, 1930s-era epic comes to a vivid new life in this newly remastered and restored version featuring never-before-seen scenes and musical sequences.

programme.title: South Central, (1992, Crime)
programme.desc: Bobby is trapped in a cycle of hatred, incarceration and bloodshed. He is a new man upon his release from prison, but South Central has gone from bad to worse. Now only Bobby can save his son from the violent and doomed future of a gang member.

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, two brothers, against all the odds, come together to train for a historic title bout that has the power to reunite their fractured family and give their hard-luck town what it's been waiting for: pride.

programme.title: Allied, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: When Intelligence Officer Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) learns his wife (Academy Award winner Marion Cotillard) may be conspiring with the enemy, he has only 72 hours to prove her innocence and save his family before he must do the unthinkable.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Lions For Lambs tells the poignant and layered story of several individuals caught up at various ends of the U.S. War on terror.

programme.title: Trumbo, (2007, Documentary)
programme.desc: Trumbo documents the rise of Dalton Trumbo's career in Hollywood, and his subsequent public humiliation from being among the "Hollywood Ten" blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee in the 1940s for communist associations.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Last Stand, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as a small border-town sheriff who makes a defiant stand to stop a fugitive on the run from the FBI.

programme.title: Barquero, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: When a small town on the Paria River is decimated by a group of vile outlaws, the bandits get more than they bargained for after the local bargeman turns the tables on the vicious gang! Lee van Cleef and Warren Oates star in this rousing western.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Conspirator, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Robert Redford comes the riveting true story behind the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln including the lone woman who was accused of plotting his murder.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: A-X-L, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog created by the military to help protect tomorrow's soldiers. Code named by the scientists who created him, A.X.L. stands for Attack, Exploration, Logistics, and embodies next-generation artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: The Spirit, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: In the vein of BATMAN BEGINS and SIN CITY, THE SPIRIT takes us on a sinister, gut-wrenching ride with a hero who is born, murdered and born again.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)

programme.title: Waiting for Guffman, (1997, Comedy)

programme.title: Best In Show, (2000, Comedy)

programme.title: A Mighty Wind, (2003, Comedy)

programme.title: Higher Learning, (1995, Independent Drama)

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Action)

programme.desc: Game show fanatic Bob Banter challenges Jaden to a duel in order to impress Alexis.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Desperate for attention, Bastion breaks into the White Dorm and demands they admit him as a member.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Zane climbs to the 'top of the world' to face his former masterChancellor Sheppard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Chancellor Sheppard returns to Duel Academy to announce the start of the GX Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Someone has stolen the Winged Dragon of Ra and is using it to cause mayhem and destruction at Duel Academy!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Pro duelist and Broadway star Orlando faces Jaden in a duel that's a real showstopper!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Jaden duels Chazz in an attempt to break Sartorius's hold over him.
programme.sub-title: Blinded by the Light: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Jaden, with the help of the OJAMAS, tries to bring Chazz to his senses.
programme.sub-title: Blinded by the Light: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Atticus's alter ego Night Shroud returns to face Zane in a Shadow Game!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: In an attempt to save their careers, Crowler and Bonaparte enlist the help of two old friends - Damon and the Little Belowski!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: A duelist from North Academy is using the power of the Grim Reaper to win duels in one move!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: A duelist from North Academy is using the power of the Grim Reaper to win duels in one move!

programme.title: The Straw Hats faith in Nami is restored, and now its time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlongs fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Namis former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. Hes so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffys face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town the final resting place of Gold Roger!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!

programme.title: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the islands caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!

programme.title: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captains place. While theyre busy beating each others brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!

programme.title: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kitetsu III and Yubashiri! Zoro's New Swords and the Woman Sergeant Major!

programme.title: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooters goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp vs. Daddy the Parent! Showdown at High!

programme.title: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanjis dreams of the legendary All Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery Cooking Battle? Sanji vs. the Beautiful Chef!

programme.title: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Buggy's Revenge! The Man Who Smiles On the Execution Platform!

programme.title: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legend Has Started! Head for the Grand Line!

programme.title: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crews voyage to the Grand Line.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Precursor to a New Adventure! Apis, a Mysterious Girl!

programme.title: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament stranded in the Calm Belt!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miraculous Creature! Apis's Secret and The Legendary Island!

programme.title: The Straw Hats want to return Apiss dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like its time for another daring escape!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eric Attacks! Great Escape from Warship Island!

programme.title: Even for Nami, finding the dragons lost island proves to be tougher than looking for a needle in a haystack or at the bottom of the ocean.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Solitary Island in the Distant Sea! The Legendary Lost Island!

programme.title: Nami discovers a map to the true location of the dragons nest, and Zorro puts his steel to the test against Eric the Whirlwind.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Ruins! Tense Zoro vs. Eric!

programme.title: The Straw Hats sail headfirst into Commodore Nelson and his Marine armada. While Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro dodge cannon balls, Eric the Whirlwind prepares a sneak attack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy, Completely Surrounded! Commodore Nelson's Secret Strategy!

programme.title: With their rescue mission taking on water, the Straw Hats get some surprising help from the great blue yonder.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Through the Sky They Soar! The 1000 Year Legend Lives Again!

programme.title: After unlocking the secrets of the dragons nest, Luffy does battle with Eric the Whirlwind to ensure the safety of the island. Dont mess with the rubberman!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Showdown! Cross the Red Line!

programme.title: The Straw Hat crew takes a wild ride up and down a mountain only to end up in the belly of a giant whale thats on the lookout for pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Line of Defense? The Giant Whale Laboon Appears!

programme.title: Luffy trades blows with Laboon the whale, and Nami is distressed to learn that navigating the Grand Line is no easy feat.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Promise Between Men! Luffy and the Whale Vow to Meet Again!

programme.title: A violent snowstorm batters the crew of the Going Merry, but once the Straw Hats arrive at Whisky Peak, the locals invite them to a raucous celebration.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Town that Welcomes Pirates? Setting Foot on Whisky Peak!

programme.title: There are bounty hunters on the prowl, and most of the Straw Hats are dead drunk. Only Zoro is still sober enough to hoist a sword.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! The Three Swords Style! Zoro vs. Baroque Works!

programme.title: Theres a mysterious princess that needs protection from a nose-picking assassin, but Luffy and Zoro are too busy duking it out to worry about explosive boogers.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: All-out Battle! Luffy vs. Zoro, Mysterious Grand Duel!

programme.title: The Straw Hats depart Whisky Peak on a mission to return the Princess of Alabasta to her kingdom while protecting her from an army of vicious assassins.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deliver Princess Vivi! The Luffy Pirates Set Sail!

programme.title: While the crew heads for Little Garden with the princess, Luffy and Zorros old nemesis, Axe-Hand Morgan, escapes from a Marine prison ship.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Try Hard, Coby! Coby and Helmeppo's Struggles in the Marines!

programme.title: Colby and Helmeppo train day and night to prove theyre tough enough to be Marines. A violent showdown with Vice-Admiral Garp will determine if theyre worth their salt.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Coby and Helmeppo's Resolve! Vice-Admiral Garp's Parental Affection!

programme.title: Luffys gang is running low on supplies, so they stop at Little Garden to find something to eat. Unfortunately for them, it might end up the other way around.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Ancient Island! The Shadow Hiding in Little Garden!

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: Sons Of New Mexico, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry becomes the guardian of a wayward boy who is in debt. Gene sends him to the New Mexico Military Institute, where he falls in with bad companions and is framed for a murder of an ex-jockey.

programme.title: The Big Sombrero, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene heads South in a fiesta of melody and a jamboree of romance. He fights for the right of rancheros to live on their rancho. Outlaws fear him and senoritas cheer him, and his famous horse Champion.

programme.title: The Cowboy And The Indians, (1949, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry runs in to opposition when he tries to aid starving Navajos. The Chief is found unconscious and his necklace gone. Lakohna, the successor, is blamed. Gene and Lakohna join to seek justice.

programme.title: Geronimo, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: In 1883, Geronimo and his small group of Apache warriors, under constant attack from both U.S. and Mexican military forces, reluctantly surrender in exchange for food and land. But promises are broken, and the Apaches declare all-out war on the U.S.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Dramedy)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Ghost Town, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: A spirited romantic comedy, Ghost Town is the story of Bertram Pincus, a cranky Manhattan dentist who develops the unwelcome ability to see dead people.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that shes gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the schools smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Jadeite is given a warning by Queen Beryl, who can no longer tolerate the generals failures. Jadeite challenges the Sailor Guardians to a showdown.
programme.sub-title: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rui is a talented tennis player but Naru has noticed a dark change in her. Worried about their classmate, Naru and Usagi go to investigate.
programme.sub-title: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami brings Usagi and Rei to her favorite park. Rei decides to have a date with Mamoru at the park before it closes down.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Juban District is having a contest to decide who can design the best wedding dress. Usagi, Rei, and all the girls in town compete.
programme.sub-title: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A photographer named Kijin Shinokawa holds a modeling contest. All the girls who have entered begin disappearing after Shinokawa photographs them!
programme.sub-title: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingos friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mikas feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that hed like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moons identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagis school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reikas chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize its her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Blindspotting, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Collin must make it through his final three days of probation for a chance at a new beginning. His bond with his volatile best friend soon gets tested when Collin sees a police officer shoot a suspect in the back during a chase through the streets.

programme.title: The Con Is On, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: In an effort to avoid paying off a massive gambling debt to a notorious mobster in England, two badly behaved con artists flee to Los Angeles, where they hatch a convoluted plot to steal jewels.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Alma Indomvel, (1970)

programme.desc: A casino manager preys on a compulsive gambler (Philip Seymour Hoffman) who had kept his obsession a secret from his girlfriend (Minnie Driver). Starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Minnie Driver, Maury Chaykin.

programme.desc: The golden retriever joins a middle-school baseball team and searches for his missing offspring. Starring Kevin Zegers, Caitlin Wachs, Cynthia Stevenson.

programme.desc: Steven Spielbergs acclaimed account of an English boys life in a WWII internment camp in Japanese-occupied China. Starring Christian Bale, John Malkovich, Miranda Richardson.
