programme.desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover a cave thats home to hundreds of wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace. Starring Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
programme.desc: When the sudden appearance of a female Light Fury coincides with the darkest threat their village has ever faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world to finally discover their true destinies as dragon and rider. Starring Jay Baruchel, America Ferrera, F. Murray Abraham.

programme.title: Switching Goals
programme.desc: Soccer-playing twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) decide to help their father (Eric Lutes), a coach seeking a seventh championship title. Starring Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen, Eric Lutes.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boys widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson). Starring Kevin Zegers, Cynthia Stevenson, Gregory Harrison.

programme.title: Rudy
programme.desc: With heart and determination an Illinois youth (Sean Astin) tackles shortcomings to play Notre Dame football. Starring Sean Astin, Ned Beatty, Charles S. Dutton.

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Jack Lengyel, the new coach at West Virginias Marshall University, vows to rebuild the schools football program after a plane crash claims the lives of 75 players, staff and fans. Starring Matthew McConaughey, Matthew Fox, Ian McShane.

programme.title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
programme.desc: Achillia returns to the arena to face her greatest challenge, while Ashur wrestles with the emotional fallout of his actions.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: In Atlanta, Meech wants to expand by launching BMF Entertainment and stepping into the music industry; a deadly shooting at Atlantas hottest nightclub puts BMF in the spotlight, bringing unwanted attention and causing a rift between the brothers.

programme.title: Finding Kendrick Johnson
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jason Pollock investigates the controversy surrounding the mysterious death of Kendrick Johnson, a Black teenager whose body was discovered inside a high school gymnasium in Valdosta, Ga.

programme.title: Mommy
programme.desc: A peculiar neighbor (Suzanne Clement) offers hope to a recent widow (Anne Dorval) who is struggling to raise a teenager (Antoine-Olivier Pilon) who is unpredictable and, sometimes, violent. Starring Anne Dorval, Antoine Olivier Pilon, Suzanne Clement.

programme.title: Easter Sunday
programme.desc: A man returns home to celebrate Easter with his riotous, bickering, eating, drinking, laughing, loving family. Starring Jo Koy, Jimmy O. Yang, Tia Carrere.

programme.title: Five Came Back
programme.desc: Conflicts arise among the 12 survivors of a jungle plane crash when it is learned only five can return to civilization. Starring Chester Morris, Lucille Ball, Wendy Barrie.

programme.title: Operation: Rabbit
programme.desc: Wile E. Coyote sets up a contraption to capture Bugs Bunny (Mel Blanc). Starring Mel Blanc.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Featuring Bugs Bunny and Wile E. Coyote.

programme.title: Picnic
programme.desc: A handsome drifter (William Holden) provokes explosive emotions in citizens (Kim Novak, Rosalind Russell) of a small Kansas town at a Labor Day festival. Based on William Inges play. Starring William Holden, Kim Novak, Rosalind Russell.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: The adventures of Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and friends.

programme.title: The Brave One
programme.desc: A Mexican boy (Michel Ray) seeks a presidential pardon for his pet bull, sold to face a matador in the bullring. Starring Michel Ray, Rodolfo Hoyos, Narciso Busquets.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Includes references to various plays by William Shakespeare.

programme.title: Hamlet
programme.desc: A young Danish prince wrestles with his conscience when he is confronted with questions of treachery and madness. Starring Laurence Olivier, Jean Simmons, Basil Sydney.

programme.title: Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: Shakespeares Renaissance lovers (Norma Shearer, Leslie Howard) tragically defy their feuding parents. Starring Norma Shearer, Leslie Howard, John Barrymore.

programme.title: The Golden Arrow
programme.desc: Genies help an Arabian bandit (Tab Hunter) locate a magic arrow he needs to claim heirship to the sultans kingdom. Starring Tab Hunter, Rossana Podesta, Umberto Melnati.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: An American singer (Elvis Presley) in Europe gets mixed up with jewel thieves and a runaway English heiress (Annette Day). Starring Elvis Presley, Annette Day, John Williams.

programme.title: It!
programme.desc: A British mamas boy (Roddy McDowall) brings to life the statue of a pointy-headed 16th-century monster. Starring Roddy McDowall, Jill Haworth, Paul Maxwell.

programme.title: My Blood Runs Cold
programme.desc: A stranger (Troy Donahue) convinces a rich mans (Barry Sullivan) daughter (Joey Heatherton) that they are reincarnated 19th-century lovers. Starring Troy Donahue, Joey Heatherton, Barry Sullivan.

programme.title: The Burning Hills
programme.desc: A young man (Tab Hunter) and a part-Mexican girl (Natalie Wood) hide from a cattle barons son (Skip Homeier) and killer henchmen. Starring Tab Hunter, Natalie Wood, Skip Homeier.

programme.title: Look in Any Window
programme.desc: A teenagers parents finally realize how bad their home life is when their son is arrested for prowling. Starring Paul Anka, Ruth Roman, Alex Nicol.

programme.title: Door-to-Door Maniac
programme.desc: A murderous thug and his cohorts take a bank executives wife hostage after their robbery plans go awry. Starring Johnny Cash, Donald Woods, Cay Forester.

programme.title: Who Killed Teddy Bear?
programme.desc: The hostess (Juliet Prowse) at a Manhattan disco receives nasty phone calls from a busboy (Sal Mineo) who works there. Starring Sal Mineo, Juliet Prowse, Jan Murray.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Bugs and Daffy argue over the technicalities of whether its duck season or rabbit season, and if Elmers license includes specific kinds of rabbits.

programme.title: Man in the Wilderness
programme.desc: Left for dead by his expedition leader (John Huston), a mauled frontier scout (Richard Harris) survives and seeks revenge. Starring Richard Harris, John Huston, Henry Wilcoxon.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck travel to Nepal.

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend
programme.desc: A medical student (Troy Donahue) and a Hollywood high-school girl (Connie Stevens) join spring-break fun in the California resort. Starring Troy Donahue, Connie Stevens, Ty Hardin.

programme.title: Looney Tunes
programme.desc: When the three beans he traded his cow for grow into a giant beanstalk, Daffy Duck decides to climb it; he discovers Bugs Bunny along the way and together they face Elmer Fudd, the giant at the top of the beanstalk.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A butcher and a simpleton climb a magical beanstalk, seeking a giant and a hen that lays golden eggs. Starring Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Dorothy Ford.

programme.title: The Glass Slipper
programme.desc: Mistreated by her stepmother and stepsisters, scullery maid Ella (Leslie Caron) finally meets her prince (Michael Wilding). Starring Leslie Caron, Michael Wilding, Keenan Wynn.

programme.title: Tom Thumb
programme.desc: A forest queen rewards a woodcutter and his wife with a son (Russ Tamblyn) just shy of six inches high. Starring Russ Tamblyn, Alan Young, Terry-Thomas.

programme.title: Honeymoon Hotel
programme.desc: A jilted bridegroom (Robert Morse) and his bachelor best man (Robert Goulet) put to use the booked suite at a Caribbean resort. Starring Robert Goulet, Nancy Kwan, Robert Morse.

programme.title: Down to Their Last Yacht
programme.desc: Socialites are shipwrecked on the island of Molakamokalu, whose queen (Mary Boland) likes to feed sharks. Starring Mary Boland, Polly Moran, Ned Sparks.

programme.title: Tarzans Peril
programme.desc: The ape man (Lex Barker) saves a jungle queens tribe from a rival tribe armed by a gunrunner (George Macready). Starring Lex Barker, Virginia Huston, George Macready.

programme.title: Men of Steel
programme.desc: Starring Andrew Tombes, Doris Weston.

programme.title: Paris Blues
programme.desc: An outstanding jazz score highlights this tale of two American musicians in Paris whose lives are changed by tourists. Starring Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Sidney Poitier.

programme.title: Seance on a Wet Afternoon
programme.desc: A medium (Kim Stanley) orders her husband (Richard Attenborough) to kidnap a child so she can stage a seance later to find it. Starring Kim Stanley, Richard Attenborough, Patrick Magee.

programme.title: Deathtrap
programme.desc: A cat-and-mouse game ensues when a blocked Broadway playwright (Michael Caine) and his wife (Dyan Cannon) meet a fan (Christopher Reeve) with an excellent script. Starring Michael Caine, Christopher Reeve, Dyan Cannon.

programme.title: To Have and Have Not
programme.desc: A boat skipper (Humphrey Bogart) flirts with a singer (Lauren Bacall) and fools Nazis on the island of Martinique. Starring Humphrey Bogart, Lauren Bacall, Walter Brennan.

programme.title: Bob Mackie: Naked Illusion
programme.desc: Bob Mackie, a six-decade costume designer, receives a Lifetime Achievement award and Tony nomination for "The Cher Show." His unique, unfiltered style is showcased.

programme.title: Pennies From Heaven
programme.desc: A sheet-music salesman (Steve Martin) escapes his wife, girlfriend (Bernadette Peters) and the Depression through his songs. Starring Steve Martin, Bernadette Peters, Christopher Walken.

programme.title: Vice Squad
programme.desc: A Los Angeles police captain (Edward G. Robinson) ties the case of a slain policeman to a bank robbery, all in a day. Starring Edward G. Robinson, Paulette Goddard, K.T. Stevens.

programme.title: Two Minute Warning
programme.desc: A police captain (Charlton Heston) and a SWAT sergeant (John Cassavetes) try to stop a sniper perched above the scoreboard in a packed football stadium. Starring Charlton Heston, John Cassavetes, Beau Bridges.

programme.title: The Omega Man
programme.desc: Led by a former TV newscaster (Anthony Zerbe), light-sensitive mutants stalk the last normal man (Charlton Heston) on Earth. Starring Charlton Heston, Anthony Zerbe, Rosalind Cash.

programme.title: The Honeymoon Killers
programme.desc: After meeting through a lonely hearts club, Martha Beck (Shirley Stoler) and Ray Fernandez (Tony Lo Bianco) swindle and murder rich, lonely women. Starring Shirley Stoler, Tony Lo Bianco, Dortha Duckworth.

programme.title: Deep Valley
programme.desc: A shy California farm girl (Ida Lupino) falls in love with a fugitive (Dane Clark) from a chain gang. Starring Ida Lupino, Dane Clark, Wayne Morris.

programme.title: Vice Squad
programme.desc: A Los Angeles police captain (Edward G. Robinson) ties the case of a slain policeman to a bank robbery, all in a day. Starring Edward G. Robinson, Paulette Goddard, K.T. Stevens.

programme.title: Twice Blessed
programme.desc: Identical twins (Lee Wilde) with different IQs trade places to reunite their parents (Preston Foster, Gail Patrick). Starring Preston Foster, Gail Patrick, Lee Wilde.

programme.title: The Big Store
programme.desc: Groucho, Chico and Harpo take over a department store whose owner has hired Groucho as a bodyguard. Starring The Marx Brothers, Tony Martin, Margaret Dumont.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest
programme.desc: Victorian Jack Worthing (Michael Redgrave), found in a handbag, seeks the hand of Lady Bracknells (Edith Evans) daughter. Starring Michael Redgrave, Michael Denison, Edith Evans.

programme.title: Gay Purr-ee
programme.desc: A starry-eyed cat grows weary of life on a French farm and heads for the excitement of 1890s Paris, followed by her tomcat suitor, Jaune-Tom (Robert Goulet), and his furry cohort, Robespierre (Red Buttons). Starring Judy Garland, Robert Goulet, Red Buttons.

programme.title: Ninotchka
programme.desc: A playboy (Melvyn Douglas) charms a Russian envoy (Greta Garbo) sent to fetch three wayward comrades in Paris. Starring Greta Garbo, Melvyn Douglas, Ina Claire.

programme.title: Which Way Is Up?
programme.desc: Pryor plays three roles in this tale centered around a California fruit picker who is transformed by greed. Starring Richard Pryor, Lonette McKee, Margaret Avery.

programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup. Starring Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby, Harry Belafonte.

programme.title: Within Our Gates
programme.desc: A white doctor falls in love with a mulatto woman (Flo Clements) who has returned to Boston to raise money for a Southern school. Starring Evelyn Preer, Flo Clements, William Smith.

programme.title: Oscar Micheaux: The Superhero of Black Filmmaking
programme.desc: The extraordinary life story of Oscar Micheaux, a pioneer of African American filmmaking in the first half of the 20th century.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Sydney Loofes vibrant life takes a tragic turn in November 2017 when she enters the world of online dating and unknowingly crosses paths with Bailey Boswell and Aubrey Trail; as their second date approaches, the couple hatches a sinister plan.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night; but when the weather report comes in for the evening showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A surprise cruise vacation for a husband and wife from Olympia, Washington ends up with one of them going overboard; is it revenge, jealousy or a murderous impulse at sea?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A professors assistant goes missing at sea near the end of a long voyage; clues to her disappearance are detailed in a diary discovered in her cabin; how did she disappear; does anyone on board know what happened to her?

programme.desc: Picky planner Courtney likes hot yoga and hotter men; her tractor-driving mother wont settle for less than farm fresh perfection.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker

programme.title: Gaslit by My Husband: The Morgan Metzer Story
